title: How to Reserve a Spot for an Event
content:
If a user asks how to reserve an event:

- Guide them to the CultPass app
- Instruct them to browse the experience catalog and tap 'Reserve'
- If it's a premium or limited event, check if reservation confirmation is required via email
- Remind them to arrive at least 15 minutes early with their QR code visible

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can reserve an experience by opening the CultPass app, selecting your desired event, and tapping 'Reserve'. Be sure to arrive 15 minutes early with your QR code ready."

title: What's Included in a CultPass Subscription
content:
Each user is entitled to 4 cultural experiences per month, which may include:
- Art exhibitions
- Museum entries
- Music concerts
- Film screenings and more

Some premium experiences may require an additional fee (visible in the app).

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Your CultPass subscription includes 4 curated experiences each month. You can choose from museums, concerts, film events and more. Premium events may have an extra cost, which is shown during reservation."

title: How to Cancel or Pause a Subscription
content:
Users can manage their subscription via the app > 'My Account' > 'Manage Plan'.

- Cancel: Effective at the end of the billing cycle
- Pause: Preserves user data, resumes automatically when reactivated
- Do NOT offer refunds unless approved by support lead

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can cancel or pause your subscription at any time via the 'My Account' section in the CultPass app. Cancelation takes effect at the end of your billing cycle."

title: How to Handle Login Issues?
content:
Most login issues are resolved with password reset:

- Ask the user to tap 'Forgot Password' on the login screen
- Ensure they are using the correct registered email
- If they did not receive the reset email, check spam folder or retry after 10 minutes
- For persistent login issues, escalate to human support

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Try tapping 'Forgot Password' on the login screen. Make sure you're using the email associated with your account. If the email doesn't arrive, check spam or try again in a few minutes."

title: How to Check Subscription Status and Quota
content:
Users can view their subscription details in the app:

- Go to 'My Account' > 'Subscription'
- Check current tier (basic or premium)
- View monthly quota remaining
- See subscription status (active, cancelled, paused)
- Check billing cycle dates

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can check your subscription status and remaining monthly quota in the 'My Account' section of the app under 'Subscription'."

title: How to Cancel a Reservation
content:
Users can cancel reservations through the app:

- Open 'My Reservations' in the app
- Select the reservation to cancel
- Tap 'Cancel Reservation'
- Cancellation must be done at least 24 hours before the event
- Cancelled reservations free up quota for the month

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can cancel a reservation by going to 'My Reservations' in the app, selecting the event, and tapping 'Cancel'. Please cancel at least 24 hours before the event."

title: Premium vs Basic Subscription Differences
content:
Subscription tiers differ in access:

- Basic: Access to standard experiences, 4 per month
- Premium: Access to standard + premium experiences, 4 per month
- Premium experiences may have additional fees even for premium subscribers
- Premium tier users get priority booking for limited events
- Both tiers have the same monthly quota

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Premium subscribers have access to both standard and premium experiences, while basic subscribers can only access standard experiences. Both tiers include 4 experiences per month."

title: What to Do If QR Code Doesn't Work
content:
If a QR code isn't scanning at an event:

- Ensure the app is updated to the latest version
- Check that the reservation is confirmed in 'My Reservations'
- Try refreshing the QR code in the app
- Contact event staff with reservation confirmation
- If issues persist, escalate to support with reservation ID

**Suggested phrasing:**
"If your QR code isn't working, try refreshing it in the app or showing your reservation confirmation to event staff. If the problem continues, contact support with your reservation ID."

title: How to Update Account Information
content:
Users can update their account details:

- Go to 'My Account' > 'Profile Settings'
- Update email, name, or password
- Email changes require verification
- Name changes are immediate
- Password changes require current password confirmation

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can update your account information in the 'My Account' section under 'Profile Settings'. Email changes will require verification."

title: Understanding Monthly Quota and Reset
content:
Monthly quota information:

- Each subscription includes 4 experiences per month
- Quota resets on the same date each month (based on subscription start date)
- Unused quota does not roll over to next month
- Cancelled reservations free up quota immediately
- Premium experiences count the same as standard experiences

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Your monthly quota of 4 experiences resets on the same date each month based on when your subscription started. Unused quota doesn't carry over."

title: How to Report Issues with an Experience
content:
If users have problems during an experience:

- Document the issue with photos if possible
- Note the experience name, date, and location
- Contact support within 48 hours of the experience
- Provide reservation ID and details of the issue
- Support will review and may offer compensation or credit

**Suggested phrasing:**
"If you encounter issues during an experience, please contact support within 48 hours with your reservation ID and details. Photos or documentation help us resolve the issue faster."

title: Blocked Account Resolution
content:
If an account is blocked:

- Accounts may be blocked for policy violations or payment issues
- Check email for notification about the block reason
- Contact support to understand the specific issue
- Resolution depends on the reason for blocking
- Payment issues can usually be resolved by updating payment method

**Suggested phrasing:**
"If your account is blocked, check your email for details about the reason. Contact support to discuss resolution options based on the specific issue."

title: How to Transfer or Gift a Reservation
content:
Reservation transfer policies:

- Reservations are non-transferable to other accounts
- Users cannot gift reservations to friends
- Each user must use their own subscription quota
- If unable to attend, cancel the reservation to free up quota
- Event staff may allow guest attendance at their discretion

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Reservations cannot be transferred between accounts. If you can't attend, please cancel your reservation to free up your monthly quota."

title: Payment and Billing Questions
content:
Common billing inquiries:

- Subscriptions are billed monthly on the same date
- Payment methods can be updated in 'My Account' > 'Billing'
- Failed payments result in subscription suspension
- Refunds are only available for cancelled subscriptions within 7 days of signup
- Billing history is available in the app

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can manage your payment method and view billing history in 'My Account' > 'Billing'. Subscriptions are billed monthly on the same date each month."

title: Finding Available Experiences
content:
How to browse and find experiences:

- Open the CultPass app and go to 'Explore'
- Filter by location, date, or category
- Premium experiences are marked with a star icon
- Check available slots before reserving
- Experiences can be bookmarked for later

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Browse available experiences in the 'Explore' section of the app. You can filter by location, date, or category to find what interests you."

title: App Notifications and Reminders
content:
Notification settings and reminders:

- Enable notifications in app settings for reservation reminders
- Users receive reminders 24 hours and 2 hours before events
- Email notifications are sent for reservation confirmations
- Notification preferences can be customized in settings
- Important account updates are always sent via email

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can customize notification preferences in app settings. You'll receive reminders before your reserved experiences and email confirmations for all reservations."

title: Premium Experience Additional Fees
content:
Understanding premium experience costs:

- Premium experiences may require additional fees beyond subscription
- Fees are clearly displayed before reservation
- Fees vary by experience and are set by event organizers
- Payment is processed at time of reservation
- Premium tier subscribers may get discounts on some premium experiences

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Some premium experiences require additional fees beyond your subscription. These fees are shown before you reserve and vary by experience."
